creator: toralf.foerster@gmx.de
text:
The sentence :

"You may wish to use mod_access inside the <Location> directive to limit access to your server configuration information:"

contains a empty link to http://n22_uml/manual/mod/mod_access.html

at my Gentoo Linux (user mode liux image) with hostname n22_uml.

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: Thanks for the report -- Fixed in r1397681, in online versions shortly, and in installed manual on next release.
